messages.title: YOUR LOCAL CAMPAIGNING VOICE FOR WITNEY

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Led the Save Cogges Surgery campaign.
Supports Remain and wants to give the final say to the public.
Actively working on tackling the climate emergency.

issues.brexitEurope: Supports Remain and wants to give the final say to the public.
issues.environment: Actively working on tackling the climate emergency.
issues.health: Led the Save Cogges Surgery campaign.

leaflet.personalStatement: I'm a West Oxfordshire District Councillor and the first woman Leader of Witney Town Council. I led the Save Cogges Surgery campaign. I support Remain and want to give YOU the final say. I am actively working on tackling the climate emergency.

images.caption: Rosa Bolger, Labour & Co-operative candidate for Witney.
